name: SwitchToAlert
summary: Switches to the currently active modal dialog for this particular driver instance.
description: Switches to the currently active modal dialog for this particular driver instance.

examples.description: Sets the user name and password in an alert prompting for credentials.
Sends keys to the alert & sets the user name and password in an alert prompting for credentials (sends keys first).

properties.argument: The action that will be taken on the alert dialog.

cliArguments.keys: Keys to send to the alert.
cliArguments.user: User name in an alert prompting for credentials.
cliArguments.password: Password name in an alert prompting for credentials.
